pages.text: Tough as a dump truck and nearly as big, these Goliaths are the worst things on two legs since Tyrannosaurus Rex.
The Baron of Hell is the highest demon among the order of the Hell Knights.
The Fireborne Barons have evolved, the descendant clan of the Baron hell breed.
The Armored Barons are grafted with the technology of The Nether with morning star gauntlets, one devastating strike obliterates both body and soul.
